name: Chess Match (itch)
description:
Chess Match is a simple matching/memory game that you play in your browser. You click on the cards to find matching pairs of world champions from the historical period of 1886-1985.

Credits:

King crown image is from PNGGURU.

Other images are in the public domain - from WIKIPEDIA.

Text font is Hamlet Tertia 18.

Based upon the javascript tutorial by Tania Rascia.

License: MIT.
